Article Title: Arvind Kejriwal, Punjab CM Mann participate in kirtan darbar to commemorate 350th martyrdom day of Sri Guru Tegh Bahadur
Article Text: Addressing the gathering during the Kirtan Darbar organised here at Gurdwara Rakab Ganj Sahib, Kejriwal said that the Punjab government is fortunate to have got the opportunity to organise a series of commemorative events dedicated to the Ninth Guru, Sri Guru Tegh Bahadur.
Article Summary: Addressing the gathering during the kirtan darbar organised here at gurdwara rakab ganj sahib, kejriwal said the punjab government is fortunate to have got the opportunity to organise a series of commemorative events dedicated to the ninth guru, sri guru tegh bahadur.

Article Title: Lamar Jackson injury update: Week 8 hamstring forces Ravens to start Tyler Huntley at quarterback
Article Text:
Lamar Jackson injury update: Week 8 hamstring forces Ravens to start Tyler Huntley at quarterback (Image Via Getty)

Lamar Jackson’s hamstring injury forces last-minute lineup change

“Lamar wanted to be out there. He’s close, but not quite ready.”

Tyler Huntley’s start changes fantasy football outlook



“If you have Derrick Henry, this might be his heaviest workload of the season.”

Lamar Jackson has officially been ruled out for Week 8 after failing to recover from a hamstring injury. The Baltimore Ravens confirmed on Saturday, October 25, 2025, that Jackson won’t play in Sunday’s matchup against the Chicago Bears at M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore. Head coach John Harbaugh said the team waited until the last practice session before making the final call. With Jackson sidelined, backup quarterback Tyler Huntley will take over as the starter.Lamar Jackson hurt his hamstring during the Ravens’ Week 4 loss to the Kansas City Chiefs on September 28, 2025. Since then, the quarterback has missed three straight games while receiving treatment and doing light workouts.This week, Jackson was limited in practice, which gave hope that he might play. But team doctors did not clear him for full contact, leading to his official scratch on Saturday. Head coach John Harbaugh told reporters after practice,According to NFL Network's Ian Rapoport, the Ravens made the choice late Saturday afternoon after Jackson reported tightness during warm-ups. Baltimore will once more rely on Huntley, who last started a regular-season game in December 2023, absent him.Without Jackson, the Ravens have struggled offensively. The team's average score in games he participated in this year was above 32. Seven points per game they have fallen under in his absence. Sunday's game against the Bears will show if the offense can adjust without its captain under center.Also Read: Travis Hunter And Wife Leanna Share Adorable Family Moment In Matching Black Gymwear With Newborn Son Tyler Huntley will lead the Ravens against the Chicago Bears on Sunday, and this change brings major shifts for fantasy football managers. Huntley, known for his mobility but not deep-ball accuracy, will likely operate a run-heavy playbook. Running back Derrick Henry could see a big boost in touches, especially in red-zone situations.Fantasy expert Matthew Berry told NBC Sports,However, Huntley’s limited passing ability could hurt wide receivers Zay Flowers and tight end Mark Andrews. Both players are expected to get less scoring opportunities and targets.Furthermore, ESPN Fantasy Live analysts observed that Huntley forecasts approximately 150 throwing yards, therefore rendering him a dangerous starting choice in every fantasy league. Until Lamar Jackson comes back, Ravens supporters hope the team can control the game via tough defense and ground control. For now, the offense definitely retreats with Huntley in charge.
Article Summary: Lamar jackson has officially been ruled out for week 8 after failing to recover from a hamstring injury. The baltimore ravens confirmed on saturday, october 25, 2025, that jackson won’t play in sunday’s matchup against the chicago bears. With jackson sidelined, backup quarterback tyler huntley will take over as the starter.

Article Title: Is Chet Holmgren playin tonight vs Atlanta Hawks? Latest update on the OKC Thunder star's injury report (October 25, 2025)
Article Text:
Chet Holmgren of OKC Thunder (Image via Jesse Johnson / Imagn)

Chet Holmgren

Oklahoma City Thunder’s

listed as questionable

Chet Holmgren’s Latest Injury Update vs Atlanta Hawks (October 22, 2025)

Oklahoma City Thunder Facing Mounting Injuries

Potential Lineup Adjustments Without Chet Holmgren

Chet Holmgren and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (Image via Jerome Miron-Imagn Images)

Holmgren’s Track Record Against the Hawks

’s availability for thematchup against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday, October 25, 2025, remains uncertain as the young star iswith lower back soreness. The 7-foot-1 center-forward has been a pivotal part of the Thunder’s strong 2-0 start to the season, but his health could influence the team’s early momentum as they look to remain unbeaten.As per the NBA’s official injury report, Chet Holmgren continues to experience discomfort in his lower back, prompting the Oklahoma City Thunder to exercise caution. The issue appears to have surfaced after he logged heavy minutes in Oklahoma City’s first two contests, both of which extended into overtime or double overtime.In Thursday’s thrilling win over the Indiana Pacers, Holmgren put in a tremendous effort, playing 39 minutes while recording 15 points, 12 rebounds, 2 assists, and 2 steals. With that much court time early in the season, the Oklahoma City Thunder’s medical team is closely monitoring his workload.Head coach Mark Daigneault and the training staff are expected to make a final call closer to tip-off at 7:30 p.m. ET (5:00 a.m. IST). Fans should keep an eye on pregame warm-ups for any sign of Chet Holmgren’s participation, as his status is expected to come down to a game-time decision.Despite starting the season as defending NBA champions and securing two impressive wins, Oklahoma City’s depth is already being tested. In addition to Holmgren, Cason Wallace (knee sprain) is also questionable for the matchup.Meanwhile, Alex Caruso (concussion protocol), Isaiah Joe (knee contusion), Jalen Williams (recovering from wrist surgery), and Kenrich Williams (knee injury) have all been ruled out.This stretch leaves Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, the reigning MVP, shouldering much of the offensive responsibility once again. Gilgeous-Alexander has been electric to start the year, dropping 35 points against the Rockets and a remarkable 55 points against the Pacers. However, Holmgren’s absence would significantly impact OKC’s defensive structure and spacing, particularly against a Hawks frontcourt anchored by Kristaps Porzingis and Jalen Johnson.If Chet Holmgren is unable to play, Daigneault may rely on Isaiah Hartenstein or Jaylin Williams (if available) to absorb the center minutes. While Hartenstein offers hustle and rebounding, he lacks Holmgren’s elite shot-blocking and perimeter shooting abilities. Losing Holmgren would also hurt the Oklahoma City Thunder’s ability to defend the Hawks’ pick-and-roll schemes, orchestrated by Trae Young.Without their rim protector, Oklahoma City’s defense may be forced to collapse more frequently inside, potentially leaving shooters like Bogdan Bogdanović and De’Andre Hunter open from the perimeter. The Thunder would not only lose a physical edge but also a psychological one, as Holmgren’s presence in the paint often alters opponents’ offensive rhythm.Historically, Holmgren has performed well against Atlanta, averaging 15.0 points, 7.0 rebounds, and 2.8 assists across four career games. His combination of size, mobility, and shooting range has made him a matchup challenge for the Hawks’ bigs, and Oklahoma City will hope he can replicate that success if cleared to play.As of now, Chet Holmgren remains questionable for Saturday’s contest, though there’s optimism he could be cleared if he passes pregame evaluations. The Oklahoma City Thunder are likely to take a balanced approach, prioritizing Holmgren’s long-term health while aiming to maintain their early-season rhythm.If he’s able to suit up, Chet Holmgren’s return would provide a huge boost to Oklahoma City’s frontcourt and defensive identity. If not, expect the Thunder to make tactical adjustments to compensate for the absence of their versatile young big man.Also read: Oklahoma City Thunder vs Atlanta Hawks injury report (October 25, 2025): Who,s playing, who's out, and more In short: Holmgren is questionable but trending toward a game-time decision due to lower back soreness as the Oklahoma City Thunder prepare to face the Atlanta Hawks.
Article Summary: Oklahoma city thunder’s chet holmgren continues to experience discomfort in his lower back. His availability for thematchup against the atlanta hawks on saturday, october 25, 2025, remains uncertain as the young star iswith lower back soreness.

Article Title: NBA gambling scandal update: Former league referee’s chilling warning hints at deeper storm brewing behind the latest controversy
Article Text:
Chauncey Billups and Terry Rozier are among other NBA players arrested for illegal gambling (Image via AP)

Tim Donaghy breaks silence with insight into the NBA’s unraveling chaos

"The TIP Of The Iceberg" - Ex-NBA Ref Tim Donaghy WARNS Mob Gambling Empire CONTROLS Pro Sports

FBI’s investigation sends shockwaves through the NBA as hidden ties begin to unravel

NBA coach Chauncey Billups was arrested in Florida (Image via AP)

The gambling probe that had landed Terry Rozier , Chauncey Billups, and Damon Jones in hot water has sent the NBA universe into a frenzy. FBI and Department of Justice have already started the investigation. Meanwhile, former NBA referee Tim Donaghy has entered the controversy. He recently said that he is not shocked a former NBA player and coach was among the 30 individuals arrested as a result of the federal investigation.Donaghy was asked if celebrities could be implicated in the unfolding controversy during his appearance on Patrick Bet-David's "PBD Podcast" on Friday. He started by outlining the characteristics of wire fraud. He said:“When you talk about wire fraud, that’s a law that can be applied to many different things.. If you’re just calling your buddy and telling him that somebody’s not playing, even if it’s a nonchalant comment, transferring that over state lines is wire fraud.”For context, in 2008, Donaghy pleaded guilty of wire fraud and distributing betting information after receiving thousands of dollars from a gambler in exchange for insider game tips. He was sentenced to 15 months in jail.He appeared on "CUOMO" to talk about the Mafia, the arrest, and the suspected involvement of Miami Heat guard Terry Rozier and Portland Trail Blazers head coach Chauncey Billups. Hence, he said:“Definitely not surprised with what’s going on.I think this is just the tip of the iceberg.”The former referee then went on to describe how players may inadvertently get into trouble for simply talking to their friends. He further said:“There’s no doubt in my mind that some of these star players must’ve been saying something to their buddies back home … and bets were placed and money was made.”In fact, he further said that he thinks a worse gambling scandal could happen at the collegiate athletic level. He then said:“You have these young athletes that aren’t going to make it to the next level, and somebody is going to offer them money to maybe fix a game and only win by 12 rather than 15, and they’re going to take that money because they’re going to need a way to support their family.”Tim Donaghy went on to say that the continuing betting controversy will only become worse over time. He talked about the group of the players who have already been detained, implying that this will result in additional arrests. He said:“These guys that are arrested are going to sit down, be scared to death, and cooperate.. This is going to spread like wildfire and it’s a lot bigger than it is right now."According to prosecutors, Billups is accused of a broad conspiracy to rig underground poker games linked to the La Cosa Nostra criminal family.Four NBA clubs have been discovered as participating in games as a result of the FBI's thorough investigation into illegal sports gambling. Portland Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups, Miami Heat forward Terry Rozier, and numerous others were charged with federal offences on Thursday as part of a large-scale investigation into illegal sports gambling and poker rigging schemes allegedly backed by the Mafia.According to the investigators, the whole thing had an impact on games played by the Charlotte Hornets , Toronto Raptors, Los Angeles Lakers, and Portland Trail Blazers. NBC News reported that the two were taken into custody on Thursday.Rozier is currently under investigation by federal authorities for allegedly operating the illegal sports betting operation. At a press conference, FBI Director Kash Patel stated that the unprecedented federal takedown on charges of wire fraud, money laundering, extortion, robbery, and illegal gambling resulted in the arrest of over 30 people across 11 states.Also read: Terry Rozier net worth: Miami Heat player's NBA journey takes an unexpected turn as he finds himself at the center of a gambling storm
Article Summary: Chauncey billups and terry rozier are among other nba players arrested for illegal gambling. Tim donaghy was asked if celebrities could be implicated in the unfolding controversy during his appearance on patrick bet-david's "pbd podcast" on friday.

Article Title: Valter Walker net worth in 2025: UFC champion’s salary, career stats, sponsorships, fight bonuses and more
Article Text:
Valter Walker net worth in 2025: UFC champion’s salary, career stats, sponsorships, fight bonuses and more (Image Via Getty)

How much money Valter Walker makes in 2025

“show”

“Performance of the Night”

How Valter Walker makes money from sponsorships

Valter Walker’s complete UFC stats and knockout wins

Valter Walker’s latest UFC fight and result in 2025

Valter Walker is a Brazilian heavyweight in the UFC making big waves in 2025. With fast finishes and a growing fan base, he’s earning more money than before. From fight pay to brand deals, his net worth is rising. Here we will look at how much Valter Walker earns, his fight record, sponsorships, and his recent standout finish.According to publicly reported purse data, Valter Walker’s guaranteed pay has been modest so far. For example, at one event, he had apurse of about US$24,000 plus a US$24,000 win bonus, and about US$4,000 in sponsorship income.At another event, his guaranteed pay was up to US$28,000, and with his win bonus and abonus of US$50,000, his total for that card could reach about US$110,000. Because of finishes and bonuses, his income in 2025 is significantly better than before.A commonly cited estimate puts his net worth around US$400,000 in 2025. While this number is not officially confirmed by the UFC, it is based on his disclosed fight income, bonuses, sponsorship deals and his recent rise.Valter Walker’s sponsorship portfolio is still in the early stages. He has small deals with sports nutrition, apparel and MMA gear brands mainly from Brazil and Russia.His growing highlight wins and demo finishes are increasing his marketability.Being the younger brother of Johnny Walker (a well-known UFC light heavyweight) also adds to his visibility. As Walker keeps winning, his endorsements are likely to scale up.Valter Walker’s professional MMA record is listed as 14 wins and 1 loss (14-1-0) in major databases. He stands at about 6 ft 6 in tall (approximately 1.98 m) and fights at heavyweight (~244 lbs) in the UFC.Walker has built a reputation for quick finishes, especially submission victories via heel hook and had multiple first-round wins in 2024 and 2025.On July 12, 2025 at a UFC Fight Night event in Nashville, Valter Walker defeated Kennedy Nzechukwu by heel hook submission in just 54 seconds.Also Read: Conor McGregor Children: Inside The UFC Legend’s Life As A Proud Father Of Four Kids For that finish he earned the Performance of the Night bonus of US$50,000. This kind of quick, dramatic win is elevating Valter Walker’s profile and likely his future earning potential.
Article Summary: Valter walker is a brazilian heavyweight in the ufc making big waves in 2025. With fast finishes and a growing fan base, he’s earning more money than before. From fight pay to brand deals, his net worth is rising. Here we will look at how much he earns, his fight record, sponsorships, and more.

Article Title: Is Ja Morant playing tonight vs Indiana Pacers? Latest update on Memphis Grizzlies star’s injury status (October 25, 2025)
Article Text:
Ja Morant of the Memphis Grizzlies speaks at a news conference during the Memphis Grizzlies Media Day at FedExForum (Image Source - Getty Images)

Memphis Grizzlies

Ja Morant

Ja Morant Injury Status vs Indiana Pacers (October 25, 2025)

The Tale of Two Games

What Morant Said About Tonight’s Game

Balancing Health and Competition

Memphis Grizzlies’ Injury Situation vs Indiana Pacers (October 25, 2025)

Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant speaks during a news conference at the NBA basketball team's media day Monday, Sept. 29, 2025, in Memphis, Tenn. (AP Photo/George Walker IV)

Indiana Pacers’ Injury Situation vs Memphis Grizzlies (October 25, 2025)

Game Details and Betting Outlook Memphis Grizzlies vs Indiana Pacers (October 25, 2025)

Projected Memphis Grizzlies Starting Lineup (If Morant Plays)

fans are anxiously awaiting confirmation on whetherwill take the court tonight as the team prepares to face the Indiana Pacers at 8:00 PM ET inside FedExForum. After an injury scare and a rough outing in Miami, the superstar guard’s availability has become one of the biggest talking points heading into this matchup.The latest update brings encouraging news - Ja Morant is not listed on the official injury report for tonight’s contest. That’s a strong indication the two-time All-Star is expected to play. Morant had been dealing with left ankle soreness during Friday’s 146-114 blowout loss to the Miami Heat, where he looked far from his best. The 26-year-old was questionable heading into that game but pushed through the pain to suit up, displaying the determination that has defined his young career.Despite playing through the soreness, Morant’s performance raised eyebrows as he struggled to find rhythm offensively. It was a sharp contrast from his dominant season opener just days earlier.Ja Morant’s first two performances of the season have told completely different stories.In the opener against the New Orleans Pelicans, he erupted for 35 points on 13-of-20 shooting, leading Memphis to a thrilling 128-122 victory. Against Miami, however, the explosive point guard was nearly unrecognizable. He finished with just 12 points on 4-of-16 shooting, along with 2 rebounds and 6 assists in 22 minutes.The noticeable drop in efficiency may have been due to his ankle discomfort. While Ja Morant hasn’t directly addressed whether the soreness limited him, it’s evident that his usual burst and explosiveness were missing in Friday’s loss.When asked if he’d be available for the Pacers matchup, Morant remained vague, responding simply with “We’ll see.” Still, his competitive spirit was evident when he added, “I want to play every night. Every day of the week.” That quote perfectly captures his mindset - one rooted in resilience and a relentless drive to compete, even through adversity.This determination isn’t surprising for a player who continues to make history. Just earlier this week, Morant joined Michael Jordan in an exclusive club for season-opening performances featuring 35 or more points on 65% shooting.The Memphis Grizzlies are facing a difficult decision with Morant’s workload. After logging just 22 minutes in Friday’s loss, Memphis’ medical staff must weigh the benefits of letting him play again on a back-to-back night against the risk of aggravating his injury.The relatively low minutes he played against Miami might help his case to be cleared for tonight, giving him a realistic chance to feature. Both Ja Morant and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope, who was also dealing with right ankle soreness, played limited minutes Friday and could both suit up again if their conditions hold steady.Beyond Ja Morant’s status, Memphis continues to deal with a long list of injuries. Five players are confirmed out for tonight’s matchup:• Zach Edey – left ankle surgery recovery• Scotty Pippen Jr. – left great toe surgery recovery (12 weeks)• Brandon Clarke – right knee surgery recovery• Ty Jerome – right calf strain• Vince Williams Jr. – right heel sorenessThis depleted rotation places even more pressure on Morant to be available. With several key contributors sidelined, the Memphis Grizzlies need his scoring and playmaking more than ever against an Indiana team still looking for its first win of the season.The Indiana Pacers head into this matchup with plenty of motivation after falling in a double-overtime thriller to the Oklahoma City Thunder in their opener. Pascal Siakam led the charge with 32 points and 15 rebounds, while Benedict Mathurin exploded for 36 points in the losing effort.The Pacers also have their own injury woes, missing several important players — including Tyrese Haliburton, who’s out for the season with an Achilles injury. Andrew Nembhard (shoulder) and T.J. McConnell (hamstring) are also sidelined, forcing Indiana to lean heavily on Siakam and Mathurin once again.Tip-off is scheduled for 8:00 PM ET at FedExForum, with the game airing on FanDuel Sports Network. Betting markets reflect the uncertainty surrounding both teams’ health situations. Memphis enters as slight 1-point favorites, with the total set at 237.5 points.The Memphis Grizzlies’ defense has been a concern early in the season, allowing an average of 134 points through their first two games. That defensive lapse could provide the Pacers with an opportunity to find offensive rhythm and potentially steal a road win if Morant’s mobility remains limited.• PG: Ja Morant• SG: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope• SF: Jaylen Wells• PF: Jaren Jackson Jr.• C: Santi AldamaWhile the final confirmation will come closer to tip-off, all indicators suggest that Ja Morant will be available tonight against the Indiana Pacers. His omission from the latest injury report and his own insistence on playing whenever possible point toward a likely return to the lineup.The key question isn’t whether he’ll play - it’s how effectively he can perform while managing his ankle soreness. Memphis needs their franchise cornerstone to rediscover his early-season form after Friday’s uncharacteristic struggles.Also read: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (October 25, 2025) For the Memphis Grizzlies, this game is about more than a single win. It’s a chance to bounce back from a crushing loss, regain confidence, and watch their leader show once again why he’s one of the NBA’s most electrifying and determined talents.
Article Summary: Memphis grizzlies guard ja morant is not listed on the official injury report for tonight’s game against the indiana pacers. Morant had been dealing with left ankle soreness during friday's 146-114 blowout loss to the miami heat. The 26-year-old was questionable heading into that game but pushed through the pain to suit up, displaying the determination that has defined his young career.

Article Title: Tom Brady leaves fans speechless with unexpected take on his Patriots statue after team’s grand honor
Article Text:
Tom Brady leaves fans speechless with unexpected take on his Patriots statue after team’s grand honor (Image Via Getty)

Tom Brady shares honest feelings on his statue

“It was a great, very thoughtful gesture by the team, by Mr. Kraft and the whole organization.

It was a very meaningful time in all of our lives. It transformed the life of an organization, but a community, and certainly in my life, personally, my family’s life.”

Dude Perfect x Tom Brady on Peyton Manning, Eli Manning, Drew Brees and Collecting Baseball Cards

“Everybody kind of plays a part. Yeah, it’s me, but it’s really all of us,” he said. “I even said, ‘I think you should be dead before you have a statue.’”

Tom Brady’s Patriots legacy and career after retirement

Tom Brady is not used to standing still while people cheer for him. But on August 8, 2025, at Gillette Stadium in Boston, Massachusetts, the New England Patriots gave their biggest legend one more unforgettable moment. The team unveiled a 12-foot bronze statue of the quarterback during a ceremony honoring his induction into the Patriots Hall of Fame. Speaking later on the “Almost Athletes with Dude Perfect” podcast, which aired on Wednesday, Tom Brady said he was thankful but also admitted the statue felt a bit strange to him.Tom Brady said the tribute was a beautiful gesture from Patriots owner Robert Kraft and the whole organization. He told the podcast hosts,He said he hoped his years in New England helped shape the community and gave fans and young athletes something positive to look up to.“All those kids now who were part of that growing up and watching how Rob Gronkowski, Tedy Bruschi, Wes Welker, Julian Edelman, Deion Branch, and Randy Moss handled success with class and respect—they have a good example for how to do that,” he added.Still, Tom Brady laughed while explaining that getting a statue while alive felt odd.The statue, standing at 12 feet, was built in honor of the No. 12 jersey Brady wore for 20 seasons in New England.Also Read: Justin Jefferson Reportedly Furious After Vikings’ Crushing Loss To Chargers Sparks Trade Rumors And Fan Outrage Online The New England Patriots picked Tom Brady in the sixth round of the 2000 NFL Draft. Guiding the team for over twenty years, he led them to six triumphs and nine Super Bowls.Tom Brady's Patriots departure in 2020 led him to join the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, where he won another Super Bowl in his first season.Having left football in February 2023, he is now in his second year as an NFL analyst for Fox Sports. Even after his retirement, Tom Brady continues to draw love from fans in New England though he clearly still feels a bit too alive for a statue just yet.
Article Summary: The new england patriots unveiled a 12-foot bronze statue of tom brady on august 8, 2025. Speaking later on the “almost athletes with dude perfect” podcast, tom brady said he was thankful but also admitted the statue felt a bit strange to him.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes turns heads in statement outfit showcasing Patrick Mahomes’ face all over
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes showcased her ultimate NFL WAG style at Arrowhead Stadium, wearing a bold gray-green sweater featuring Patrick Mahomes' face front and back. She paired the eye-catching top with a matching mini skirt and thigh-high boots, accessorizing with luxury items. This fashion statement highlights her devoted game-day spirit and continues her streak of stylish appearances.

Brittany Mahomes turns game day into a fashion statement with a Patrick-inspired ensemble

Chiefs WAG style queen continues her fashion touchdown streak

Brittany Mahomes is proving once again that she’s the ultimate NFL WAG style star. The 30-year-old entrepreneur and wife of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes turned Arrowhead Stadium into her personal runway during Sunday’s matchup against the Las Vegas Raiders, wearing a look that paid the ultimate tribute to her husband.Known for her unapologetically bold game-day looks, Patrick Mahomes' wife Brittany Mahomes didn’t hold back this time. She stepped out in a gray-green long-sleeve crewneck sweater emblazoned with a massive image of Patrick Mahomes’ face, front and back, as the Chiefs celebrated a dominant 30-0 victory over the Raiders. The standout piece featured the quarterback wearing his signature No. 15 jersey and helmet, making it impossible to miss who she was cheering for.Brittany paired the eye-catching top with a matching mini skirt and sleek thigh-high black boots, adding a polished yet playful touch to her spirited outfit. She accessorized with gold jewelry and carried a $3,000 black quilted Saint Laurent handbag, tying together a look that was equal parts sporty and luxurious. Her hair was pulled back into a tousled updo, keeping the attention on her statement outfit.A video shared on social media captured Brittany walking hand in hand with Patrick, accompanied by their two older children, daughter Sterling Skye, 4, and son Patrick “Bronze” Lavon Mahomes III, 2.Their youngest, 9-month-old Golden Raye, was also seen being pushed in a stroller. The Mahomes family, dressed in coordinating Chiefs colors, continues to be one of the NFL’s most talked-about sideline presences.This isn’t the first time Brittany has made headlines for her fashion-forward team spirit. Just a week earlier, she wore custom denim jeans decorated with Chiefs graphics, Patrick’s number, and Arrowhead Stadium-inspired prints for the game against the Detroit Lions.Brittany’s fashion choices blend devotion and personality, proving she’s not just cheering from the sidelines, she’s redefining what it means to be a modern NFL power wife. From custom denim to couture-inspired team gear, Brittany Mahomes continues to score big in both love and style.Also Read: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt is in awe of Patrick and Brittany Mahomes’ heartwarming act that raised $1.5 million for kids
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes turned arrowhead stadium into her personal runway during sunday’s matchup against the las vegas raiders. She wore a gray-green long-sleeve crewneck sweater emblazoned with a massive image of patrick mahomes’ face, front and back, as the chiefs celebrated a dominant 30-0 victory.

Article Title: “The plot of a rom-com”: Madison Beer and Justin Herbert’s Lakers date goes viral after his heroic move melts the internet
Article Text:
(Image Via Glamour/Google)

obsessed

Justin Herbert turns into Madison Beer’s real-life hero at Lakers game

Fans are losing it over their ‘movie scene’ moment

“This is literally the plot of a rom-com, and I'm 100% here for it. That is just effortlessly smooth. The "QB saving the pop star" crossover is not what I had on my bingo card today.”

“Justin Herbert casually saving Madison Beer like it’s part of his NFL contract is the most LA crossover ever.”

If saving your girlfriend from a flying basketball doesn’t scream dream boyfriend material, what does? Los Angeles Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert and singer Madison Beer had a courtside moment straight out of a rom-com at the Lakers vs. Timberwolves games and fans areThe two were enjoying the action on October 24 when a stray basketball came dangerously close to their seats. Before it could even reach Madison, Herbert’s quick reflexes kicked in, he raised his arm and blocked the ball like a pro. The moment, caught in perfect HD by courtside cameras, instantly went viral.The pair were seated front and center, drawing attention even before the ball incident. Between whispers of their romance and the fact that both looked effortlessly cool, the internet didn’t need much to spiral. But when Herbert jumped into action to protect Madison, fans collectively lost their minds.Photos show the ball heading toward them while Herbert, without missing a beat, extended his arm to shield Madison, who looked adorably surprised. For someone used to dodging blitzes on Sundays, a flying basketball was just another day’s work.Within minutes, the internet crowned Herbert and Beer the “it” couple of the night.Fan edits flooded X and TikTok, romantic music overlaid on slow-motion clips of the quarterback’s heroic save.Tweets rolled in like:Another one added,It wasn’t just football fans swooning, Madison’s fanbase joined in too, calling it “peak main character energy.” Some even joked that Herbert deserves a “Boyfriend of the Year” award before they’ve even confirmed they’re dating.From subtle matching fits to shared appearances, they’ve quietly become one of the most talked-about duos in LA. Now, after Herbert’s protective courtside move, fans are convinced that they are the IT couple. One heroic gesture, one flying basketball, and one viral moment later, the Chargers star has officially joined the ranks of celebrity boyfriends who go the extra mile.Also read - Madison Beer dethrones Taylor Swift as Spotify’s fastest-growing female artist — gains 430K listeners in one day
Article Summary: Los angeles chargers quarterback justin herbert and singer madison beer had a courtside moment straight out of a rom-com. The two were enjoying the action on october 24 when a stray basketball came dangerously close to their seats. Herbert's quick reflexes kicked in, he raised his arm and blocked the ball like a pro.

Article Title: UFC 321 media room erupts as reporter asks Mackenzie Dern uncomfortable body question before title fight
Article Text:
UFC 321 media room erupts as reporter asks Mackenzie Dern uncomfortable body question before title fight (Image via Getty)

Mackenzie Dern responds before fight against Virna Jandiroba

Fans react strongly to reporter’s ‘creepy’ question to Mackenzie Dern

Mackenzie Dern, one of the top UFC strawweight fighters, was left surprised during a press event ahead of her title fight at UFC 321 this weekend. The 32-year-old fighter was answering questions from reporters when one reporter asked her about her looks and then suddenly asked how many times a week she squats and how much weight she squats. Many UFC fans watching the live press conference found the question very uncomfortable and called it “creepy” on social media.Mackenzie Lynne Dern, who is ranked No. 5 in the UFC strawweight division, will fight No. 1 ranked Virna Carole Andrade Jandiroba for the strawweight title.The fight is taking place at UFC 321, and the winner will become the new strawweight champion after Zhang Weili moved to the flyweight division and left the belt vacant.During the press meet, the reporter said fans love Mackenzie Dern not just for her fighting style but also for her good looks, and then asked about her squatting routine.Mackenzie Dern laughed but looked surprised and gave a thumbs up to someone in the crowd before replying that she squats every day and trains a lot.UFC and MMA fans quickly reacted on X after watching the video. Many fans said the question was unprofessional, especially during fight week before a title match.One fan wrote that the reporter should lose his job.Another fan commented that sometimes reporters forget that millions of people are watching. Some even joked that the question sounded like a teenage boy trying to flirt.Also Read: Is Conor McGregor Secretly Married To Dee Devlin? Wedding Rumors Explode After Ring And God Statement In Rome Fans said that instead of asking serious questions about the biggest fight of her career, the reporter focused on her looks and body.Mackenzie Dern enters this title fight with a 15-5 professional record and has already defeated Virna Jandiroba once before, by unanimous decision at UFC 256 in December 2020.Now, both fighters are ready again, and this time the UFC strawweight championship is on the line.
Article Summary: Mackenzie dern, one of the top ufc strawweight fighters, was left surprised during a press event ahead of her title fight at ufc 321 this weekend. The 32-year-old fighter was answering questions from reporters when one reporter asked her about her looks and then suddenly asked how many times a week she squats.

Article Title: Is Tyreek Hill retiring? Miami Dolphins WR reacts to future in NFL after traumatic knee injury, says "happy with the career I've had"
Article Text:
Tyreek Hill speaks about his NFL future.

Tyreek Hill talks about his career and the injury

Supporting Tua Tagovailoa through tough times

Also read

Miami Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill is facing a tough decision after a serious knee injury ended his season in Week 4 against the New York Jets. Hill, 30, has had two huge seasons with Miami, including a league-leading 1,799 yards in 2023, but now he’s not sure if he’ll return to the field next year. Hill got hurt in the third quarter when his left knee twisted awkwardly as he was tackled near the Jets’ sideline after making a catch. The injury immediately ended his season, leaving both him and the Dolphins unsure about the future — even though his contract with Miami runs through next season.On teammate Terron Armstead’s podcast, Hill opened up about how he will decide whether to come back. “At the end of the day, I feel like that decision is based on how I feel and where my mindset is at the moment,” he said. “I'm happy with the career that I've had. I love playing football, but it takes a lot — mentally and physically.” He also shared how he reacted in the moment he got hurt. “When I got tackled, I tried to get up and saw my leg was crooked. I just started laughing because I’ve been able to play this game for 10 years — my entire life, really — and I’ve been blessed with great talents and support from my family,” Hill said. “I wasn’t even thinking about the injury, just about all the great moments I’ve had playing this game.”Hill won a Super Bowl with the Kansas City Chiefs in 2020 and has become one of the league’s most explosive receivers.Even as Miami has struggled this season, dropping to 1–6 after a loss to Cleveland, Hill remains confident in the team and supportive of quarterback Tua Tagovailoa. “Everybody’s apparently on the hot seat. It’s a tough situation, but I’ll support Tua no matter what because that’s my brother,” Hill said. “He wants to win — and that should show people his commitment.”With Hill out, the Dolphins will need to adjust their offense while he takes time to heal and think about his future. His decision will depend on both his physical recovery and how he feels mentally about continuing his career.
Article Summary: Tyreek hill is facing a tough decision after a serious knee injury ended his season. Hill, 30, has had two huge seasons with miami, including a league-leading 1,799 yards in 2023. His decision will depend on both his physical recovery and how he feels mentally.

Article Title: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (October 25, 2025)
Article Text:
Joel Embiid is making a comeback (Image via Getty Images)

Joel Embiid is officially set to play tonight as the Philadelphia 76ers

Joel Embiid’s Availability and Expected Minutes

Opening Night Performance

Sixers’ Current Injury Report vs Charlotte Hornets (October 25, 2025)

Preview: 76ers vs. Hornets (October 25, 2025)

take on the Charlotte Hornets on October 25, 2025. The reigning NBA MVP was not listed on the team’s latest injury report, signaling that his recovery from offseason knee surgery continues to progress well.Joel Embiid’s status for the Sixers’ home opener at the Xfinity Mobile Arena is fully active. Head coach Nick Nurse, however, is expected to handle his playing time with caution. Similar to the season opener against the Boston Celtics, Embiid will likely be limited to around 20–25 minutes as the team prioritizes long-term durability after back-to-back knee surgeries over the past two years. The Sixers are determined to manage their superstar’s health throughout the lengthy campaign.Joel Embiid’s return game against Boston wasn’t his sharpest, finishing with just 4 points on 1-of-9 shooting along with 6 rebounds and 2 assists in 20 minutes. Despite the poor shooting performance, his leadership and defensive presence were vital in stabilizing the team during key stretches. Philadelphia 76ers’ offense was carried by rookie sensation V.J. Edgecombe, who exploded for 34 points in his NBA debut, and Tyrese Maxey, who dropped 40 points to lead the Sixers to a commanding victory over their Eastern Conference rivals.While Embiid is back in action, the Philadelphia 76ers are still short-handed. Paul George remains out as he continues to recover from left knee surgery, though his return to practice suggests he could debut soon. Jared McCain is sidelined after thumb surgery, and Trendon Watford is unavailable due to a hamstring injury. On a more positive note, rookie Justin Edwards is listed as probable with rib soreness. Philadelphia 76ers is expected to roll with a starting lineup of Tyrese Maxey, V.J. Edgecombe, Kelly Oubre Jr., Dominick Barlow, and Joel Embiid.Tonight’s matchup serves as an intriguing early-season test between two promising Eastern Conference squads. The Hornets arrive in Philadelphia fresh off a 136–117 win over the Brooklyn Nets, led by LaMelo Ball, Brandon Miller, and Miles Bridges. Charlotte’s offensive trio will test the Sixers’ defensive structure, especially with Joel Embiid playing restricted minutes as he continues to regain rhythm and conditioning.Also read: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (October 25, 2025) Joel Embiid’s continued participation marks another significant milestone in his return to full form. While fans shouldn’t expect dominant scoring numbers just yet, his presence alone elevates the Sixers’ defensive capabilities and overall confidence. Philadelphia 76ers will likely focus on maintaining Joel Embiid’s health and stamina through the early stretch of the season rather than overworking him. For now, Sixers fans can breathe a sigh of relief—The Process is officially active and back on the court tonight in Philadelphia.
Article Summary: Joel embiid is officially set to play tonight as the philadelphia 76ers take on the charlotte hornets. The reigning nba mvp was not listed on the team’s latest injury report, signaling that his recovery from offseason knee surgery continues to progress well.

Article Title: “Daboll stuck his head in…”: NFL’s latest fines raise eyebrows as Brian Daboll and Cam Skattebo caught in concussion tent controversy
Article Text:
“Daboll stuck his head in…”: NFL’s latest fines raise eyebrows as Brian Daboll and Cam Skattebo caught in concussion tent controversy (Image Via Getty)

Why Brian Daboll and Cam Skattebo are facing heavy fines for concussion protocol breach



“stuck his head in”

“I just stuck my head in to see how our quarterback was doing … In no way would I want a player to come back out there that wasn’t ready to play.”

NFL’s concussion policy under scrutiny after Brian Daboll and Cam Skattebo violation

“created the perception”

On October 24, 2025, the New York Giants were hit with heavy fines after head coach Brian Daboll and rookie running back Cam Skattebo violated the NFL concussion-protocol rules during their Week 6 game versus the Philadelphia Eagles. The incident occurred on October 9, 2025, at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, when rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart was escorted to the blue medical tent for a concussion check. While Dart was receiving care, Daboll and Skattebo entered the tent area, a zone reserved only for medical staff prompting the league and the players’ union to act.During the third quarter of the game, Jaxson Dart was sacked and held his head on the ground. He was taken to the sideline medical tent for a concussion evaluation. The NFL and NFLPA found that Brian Dabollthe tent and Cam Skattebo subsequently entered and spoke with Dart before his evaluation was complete, actions that constituted a perception of interference.Although the review stated neither Daboll nor Skattebo actually disrupted Dart’s exam or care, their presence violated the policy that “only medical personnel deemed essential to the care of the athlete” may be present during such evaluations.As a consequence, Daboll was fined $100,000, Skattebo $15,000, and the Giants organization faced a $200,000 fine. After the incident, Brian Daboll publicly apologised, explaining:Also Read: “Jaxson Dart Is A Better Player”: Brian Daboll Faces Ruthless Decision After Russell Wilson Pushes Back Against Quarterback Challenge This situation highlights the strictness of the NFL’s concussion-protocol rules, which are in place to protect players like Jaxson Dart and uphold independence in medical evaluations.The league’s joint statement from the NFL and NFLPA emphasised that while Dart’s care was properly managed, the actions of Brian Daboll and Cam Skatteboof interference and therefore violated the protocol.In response, the New York Giants have moved to implement additional staff training and tighter access controls to avoid similar mistakes.Meanwhile, the Giants’ upcoming rematch with the Eagles has extra attention now, not just for the game result, but with this off-field issue fresh in mind. The incident serves as a reminder that even well-intentioned actions can cross the line when player safety protocols are involved.
Article Summary: Brian daboll and cam skattebo fined $100,000 and $15,000, respectively, for concussion protocol breach. New york giants quarterback jaxson dart was taken to the sideline medical tent for a concussion evaluation during a game against the philadelphia eagles. While dart was receiving care, the pair entered the tent area, a zone reserved only for medical staff.

Article Title: Vancouver Canucks acquire forward Lukas Reichel from Blackhawks for 2027 fourth-round pick
Article Text:
Canucks choose Lukas Reichel from Blackhawks for 2027 draft pick (Image via X.com/Twitter)

Canucks land on Lukas Reichel from Blackhawks for 2027 draft pick

Lukas Reichel’s performance in NHL so far

Also read:

In a move to bolster the team’s strength and capacity, the Vancouver Canucks have reportedly acquired 23-year-old Blackhawks forward Lukas Reichel, as announced by NHL . Vancouver Canucks General Manager Patrik Allvin announced today that the club has acquired forward Lukas Reichel from the Chicago Blackhawks in exchange for a fourth-round pick in the 2027 NHL Entry Draft. Earlier, Reichel was originally selected by the Chicago Blackhawks in the first round, 17th overall, in the 2020 NHL Entry Draft.The Vancouver Canucks have landed on Lukas Reichel from the Blackhawks for a fourth-round pick in the 2027 NHL Entry Draft. This was announced by Vancouver Canucks General Manager Patrik Allvin on October 25, Saturday.Speaking about the decision to acquire Lukas Reichel, the general manager Allvin stated, “Lukas is an exciting young player and someone we feel can help improve our forward group. He is a talented playmaker who can create scoring opportunities with his offensive ability.He further added, “We like the way he moves on the ice and his overall work ethic, and feel our coaching staff can help him become a better and more consistent hockey player.”Meanwhile, Reichel is on a two-year, $2.4 million deal that pays him $1.2 million annually. In addition to this, he is scheduled to become a restricted free agent at the end of this season.The possible reason behind choosing him for a draft pick from the Blackhawks is his scoring abilities, viewing him as a potential depth scorer who can add creativity to their forward group.As per reports, Lukas Reichel has appeared in five games with Chicago this season, registering four points (2-2-4), two penalty minutes, and a +1 plus/minus rating. His four points are t-6th on the Blackhawks, while his two goals are t-4th on the team.The German forward has appeared in 174 games in his career, all with Chicago, recording 58 points. He has also skated in 121 games in the AHL for the Rockford IceHogs, posting 116 points and 22 penalty minutes, and was named to the 2023 AHL All-Star Game.Moreover, Reichel has represented Germany internationally on multiple occasions, including the 2020 World Junior Hockey Championships and the 2021, 2022, 2024, and 2025 World Championships.
Article Summary: The vancouver canucks have reportedly acquired 23-year-old blackhawks forward lukas reichel. The german forward has appeared in 174 games in his career, all with chicago, recording 58 points. He has also skated in 121 games in the ahl for the rockford icehogs, posting 116 points and 22 penalty minutes.

Article Title: Aryna Sabalenka vs Iga Swiatek net worth in 2025: Who is richer, earnings, tennis rivalry, career and more
Article Text:
Aryna Sabalenka vs Iga Swiatek net worth in 2025: Who is richer, earnings, tennis rivalry, career and more (Image via Getty)

Aryna Sabalenka net worth and 2025 earnings

Iga Swiatek net worth and sponsorship deals



Who is richer in 2025 between Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek

Latest news in Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek rivalry

Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek are the top two players in women’s tennis right now. Both are winning major titles, breaking records, and making millions from prize money and brand deals in 2025. Fans everywhere are asking one simple question: who is richer this year? Here is a clear distinction of their net worth, earnings, tennis journey, and what is happening in their rivalry right now.Aryna Sabalenka has an estimated net worth of around $27.4 million in 2025, as reported by Forbes and leading sports finance outlets. She won the 2025 US Open, which helped push her total career prize money to over $42 million.In this season alone, Aryna Sabalenka has earned more than $12 million in prize money, one of the highest totals ever in a single WTA season.She also makes nearly $15 million every year from top brands like Nike, Wilson, Audemars Piguet, and Electrolit. She is currently World No. 1 in the WTA rankings. Iga Swiatek has an estimated net worth of around $30 million in 2025, which is slightly more than Sabalenka, according to Forbes and major global news reports.She won Wimbledon 2025 and also claimed big titles in Cincinnati and Seoul this year.Iga Swiatek has made over $9.4 million in prize money this season.Her brand deals include Rolex, On Running, Lexus, and Tecnifibre, and they give her a very strong income outside tennis. Swiatek is currently World No. 2, just behind Sabalenka.Both are extremely close in earnings, but Iga Swiatek is currently richer by around $3 million. Aryna Sabalenka earned more prize money in 2025, but Iga Swiatek’s long-term brand deals and business partnerships give her a slightly higher total net worth.However, the gap is very small and could change soon at the WTA Finals 2025 in Riyadh, where both players are competing for the year-end World No. 1 ranking and a huge prize money reward.A recent controversy began after Ukrainian player Marta Kostyuk claimed that Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek may have a hormonal advantage, which went viral and caused debate among tennis fans.Both Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek have not replied to the comment and are fully focused on the WTA Finals 2025. Their rivalry remains the biggest and most followed in women’s tennis today.Also Read: Andre Agassi And Steffi Graf’s Daughter Jaz Posts Sweet Anniversary Wish As Parents Celebrate 24 Years Together They are not just the best players, they are also the top earners in the sport.
Article Summary: Aryna sabalenka and iga swiatek are the top two players in women’s tennis right now. Both are winning major titles, breaking records, and making millions from prize money and brand deals in 2025. Here is a clear distinction of their net worth, earnings, tennis journey, and what is happening in their rivalry.

Article Title: “What a nuisance”: 93-year-old Hollywood icon Rita Moreno breaks silence on Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl controversy
Article Text:
Hollywood icon Rita Moreno defends reggaeton star Bad Bunny. He is set to perform at the Super Bowl. Critics question his suitability. Moreno, a proud Puerto Rican, dismisses these concerns. She highlights his talent and the importance of Latino representation. Her support comes as a petition calls for his replacement. This marks a significant moment for Latino artists.

Rita Moreno proudly supports Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl spotlight

A historic moment for Latino artists despite criticism



Hollywood legend Rita Moreno is standing up for Bad Bunny as backlash grows over his upcoming Super Bowl Halftime Show performance. The 93-year-old icon, known for her groundbreaking career and outspoken pride in her Puerto Rican heritage, has made it clear she fully supports the Latin superstar despite petitions calling for his replacement.Speaking to Us Weekly en Español at the 2025 Billboard Latin Music Awards, Rita Moreno didn’t hesitate when asked about the controversy surrounding Bad Bunny being selected as the Super Bowl LV performance headliner. “Bad Bunny at the Super Bowl? Ay, I’m delirious!” she exclaimed with joy.When told that critics claimed the reggaeton artist wasn’t “American” enough for the event, Moreno fired back with grace and humor: “So what? I’m Puerto Rican too. So what? What a nuisance!” Her comment instantly resonated with fans who saw her words as a proud defense of Latino representation on one of the world’s biggest stages.During the Miami-based Billboard Latin Music Awards, Moreno personally presented Bad Bunny, whose real name is Benito Antonio Martínez Ocasio, with the Billboard Latin Artist of the 21st Century Award. Her heartfelt introduction reflected the parallels between their careers: “When I was starting out, opportunities were few, and every small step forward was a victory.Today, I see an artist who brings that same strength, that same passion to the world — just like the one that helped me never give up. ”Meanwhile, controversy continues to swirl online. Over 82,000 people have signed a petition urging the NFL to replace Bad Bunny with country legend George Strait. However, Moreno’s words add a powerful counterpoint, celebrating progress and diversity in entertainment rather than limiting it.With Bad Bunny set to headline at Levi’s Stadium in California in February 2026, Moreno’s endorsement feels both symbolic and historic, a torch passed from one Puerto Rican trailblazer to another, bridging generations of cultural pride and resilience.Also Read: “Illegal immigrants”: MAGA outrage reaches boiling point after Roger Goodell defends Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl performance
Article Summary: Hollywood icon rita moreno defends reggaeton star bad bunny. Critics question his suitability. Moreno, a proud puerto rican, dismisses these concerns. She highlights his talent and the importance of latino representation. Her support comes as a petition calls for his replacement.

Article Title: What’s the real story behind the NFL’s $315,000 fine against the New York Giants?
Article Text:
Giants, Brian Daboll and Cam Skattebo fined for violating NFL concussion protocol in Jaxson Dart case (Imagn Images)

Giants fined for violating NFL concussion protocol



League enforces accountability amid concussion concerns



The New York Giants have been slapped with hefty fines after breaching the NFL ’s concussion protocol during quarterback Jaxson Dart’s medical evaluation against the Philadelphia Eagles. The league and the NFL Players Association jointly announced the penalties on Friday, totaling $315,000 in fines. The Giants were fined $200,000, head coach Brian Daboll received a $100,000 penalty, and running back Cam Skattebo was fined $15,000 for conduct deemed detrimental to the league.The incident took place on October 9 at MetLife Stadium, midway through the third quarter when rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart was sacked and remained down on the field, holding his helmet. Following standard concussion procedures, Dart was escorted to the team’s blue medical tent for an evaluation by both the team’s medical staff and an independent neurotrauma consultant.However, the league’s review later revealed that Brian Daboll approached the tent and briefly stuck his head inside, while Cam Skattebo entered the tent before the evaluation concluded. Under the NFL’s concussion protocol, only essential medical personnel—such as the club physician, athletic trainer, and independent consultant—are allowed to be present during a player’s examination.A joint NFL–NFLPA statement said the coach and player’s actions “created the perception that they were interfering with Dart’s exam.” Although the investigation found no evidence that either man influenced the evaluation or Dart’s medical care, it concluded that “their conduct was inconsistent with and demonstrated a disregard for the concussion protocol’s requirements and therefore constituted a violation. ”Daboll was seen speaking animatedly with team doctor Scott Rodeo while waiting to learn if Dart would be cleared to return. After the game, Daboll said he only wanted to check on his quarterback’s condition and determine if a timeout was needed before a potential fourth-down play. Still, the league considered his action a breach of established medical boundaries.The NFL emphasized that the Giants’ medical staff properly followed all the necessary steps of the concussion protocol. The organization has since introduced remedial measures, including refresher training for players and staff, and new access rules to ensure only authorized individuals enter the medical tent during an evaluation.The league said these corrective actions were considered when determining the fines.The NFL’s concussion protocol remains a closely watched area of league policy, particularly following high-profile incidents like Tua Tagovailoa’s head injury in 2024. The joint NFL–NFLPA system conducts automatic reviews of all potential breaches to safeguard player health and ensure compliance.Dart later cleared all return-to-play procedures and finished the game, helping the Giants secure a 34–17 victory over Philadelphia.Despite the controversy, Daboll took full responsibility for his mistake, admitting he expected the fine but emphasizing his concern was purely for Dart’s well-being—a costly but crucial reminder of the boundaries set by the league’s player safety protocols.Also Read: “She treated us like gold": What Travis Kelce’s coach experienced while meeting Taylor Swift shows why everyone loves her so much
Article Summary: Giants, brian daboll and cam skattebo fined for violating nfl concussion protocol in jaxson dart case. The league and the nfl players association jointly announced the penalties on friday, totaling $315,000 in fines. The incident took place on october 9 at metlife stadium, midway through the third quarter.
